campfire.6614f767-59b6-4acb-9d29-b0b05a77e916: [Upon drinking some coffee, you get +1 to Dexterity!]
campfire.888afff3-b9a7-4641-b3a1-05222043837f: [Mmhm! Nothing beats a nice cup of coffee! You feel more energetic! You gain some important culinary experience!]
campfire.343283aa-0fb9-4644-ba5d-94c3089400a1: [By drinking an unhealthy dose of strong chifir', you will get +1 to your Attention!]
campfire.ab734a88-edf0-45cb-a291-f23532623be0: [Whoa! Strong stuff! Some day your kidneys will remember your betrayal, but now you just feel more attentive. You gain some important culinary experience!]
